events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
Recruiter categorized the application under the engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and devops experience.
A recruiter was assigned to handle this candidate’s application to coordinate communication and schedule interviews.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to discuss the candidate’s experience with software development and technical skills.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing strong interest in the role and willingness to proceed with technical interviews.
The technical interview was scheduled for next week, focusing on backend systems, database design, and devops best practices.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and the candidate’s long-term career goals.
The HR interview went well with positive feedback on cultural fit and alignment with company values.
An offer was proposed to the candidate including a competitive salary package and benefits that align with their expectations.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer, confirming their start date and readiness to begin onboarding.
The onboarding process was initiated with orientation sessions, account setups, and initial team introductions.
The recruitment case has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
